name: The Lost (itch) (8 Bit Simple)
description:
Play as a lost soul who died on Halloween on this short atmospheric platformer rich with atmosphere and narrative.

Jump over lethal spikes! And avoid your own toxicity as it rains on you!

But don't forget to enjoy a procedurally generated city to view from the windows and between cars. 

With a nice and smooth jazz inspired lofi soundtrack to top it off with. The music also grows along with you as you progress through the stages of dying.

But watch out! You only have one chance of accepting your death and moving on.

Who made this?!
I made everything from the code to the art to the music; to the store front and promo shots. It was all done in around 12-15 hours thanks to my day job and missing the first day of the jam.
